question: Which one of the following nitrate will decompose to give <katex>$NO_{2}$</katex> on heating? [cite: 245]
explanation: Lithium nitrate (<katex>$LiNO_3$</katex>) decomposes to form oxide (<katex>$Li_2O$</katex>), <katex>$NO_2$</katex>, and <katex>$O_2$</katex>. Other alkali metal nitrates give nitrites and oxygen. [cite: 248, 250]
